entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as the Potions master, with a shadowy presence in his study. He is shaking Harry's arm tightly and has a white face with bared teeth.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being thrown by Snape, having his glasses slip down his nose, and trying to free his arm from Snape's grip.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter refers to Harry Potter, implying that he is a member of the Potter family. This is mentioned by Snape in his conversation with Harry.

relationships.description: Snape is gripping Harry's arm tightly, causing Harry's hand to feel numb. This is described in the text as 'So... been enjoying yourself, Potter?'
Snape throws Harry from him with all his might. This is described in the text as 'Snape threw Harry from him with all his might.'
